name: Zero-G-Racer
description: FPV arcade simulator, drone racing with onboard weapons and ammo for fun piloting. Real-life driving scenarios for the simulator side. you can fly open world maps, fpv race, you can run against  your ghost  of your best lap. you can destroy drones, droids, animals, humans and 4x4 desert fox. in scen ario mode, you can chase drift cars, rally cars, flying on desert, bando in many places. there's a special decoration for christmas and halloween, and you have night day mode on several maps depending on the time you playing game. 13 maps arcade and 5 maps scenario. you can fly on mars or just have fun on beach chasing boats or fly on jungle or desert. I hope you have as much fun as I had developing this game.
